EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_PCF Roadshow_Q314.Email Confirm - Sydney
EmailTemplate.subject: You are confirmed: Pivotal Cloud Platform Roadshow - Sydney
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thank you for registering for the upcoming Pivotal Cloud Platform Roadshow in Boston. Please find the event details below:
Date: Thursday, September 18, 2014 Time: Session #1 begins @ 8:00AM/Session #2 begins @ 11:45 AM/Session #3 begins @ 2:45PM/Session #4 begins @ 4:15PM Location: Coming soon! We will update you as soon as a location is secured.
Prior to the event, please create an account on Pivotal Network <https://network.pivotal.io/>. To fully participate in the workshop, bring your laptop with wireless connectivity enabled.
Questions? Please contact us via email <mailto:pivotal-operations@pivotal.io> or visit our website <http://www.pivotal.io>.
Thank you, The Pivotal Team
